summary: Adventure in Skyrim alongside Katniss Everdeen.
descriptionHtml:
*Update* Thanks to razien for his helpful suggestions. Katniss should perform much better now.

Description:
As requested, now you can have Katniss Everdeen follow you on your adventures in Skyrim! You can find her in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. If you have ENB, she might be hard to notice if she\'s sitting in a dark corner of the room. Ask her to join you and she will, simple as that. She starts with simple clothes and nothing else, but she\'ll also equip a bow once she gets involved in combat. She\'ll wear any armor you give her, since just about anything you give her has a better armor rating than clothes. Her AI favors the bow, so that\'s what she\'ll default too when she has nothing else. If anyone wishes to edit her in the Creation Kit, her ID is Katniss. This is a very simple mod, as I\'ve never done this before and am new to the CK, so please let me know if there are any problems--I don\'t pretend to know what I\'m doing.

If you wish to play as this character, you can download the savegame here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15753


Required Mods:
Fountain of Youth Beauty Project: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2535
Coolsims Hair Pack (OLD VERSION): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809


Reccomended Mods (NOT REQUIRED):
Natural Eyes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3589
Leather Backpack: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13732
Triss Armor Retextured: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4708
Whiterun Trees: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9424
Better Arrows: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13185
Proper Aiming: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13652
SkyTest (Enhances animal behavior for immersion, say, if you like to hunt): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10175


Installation:
After installing the required mods, extract the contents of the zip file with 7zip or equivalent and paste the ESP file into Skyrim/Data. Make sure that KatnissFollower.esp is checked in the Nexus Mod Manager. This mod should be loaded after the mods it relies on, or you could have some issues.
author: Wanser
